entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 12 April 2023
